scripts.list-routes: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const getRoutes = (dir, baseRoute = '') => { const files = fs.readdirSync(dir); let routes = []; files.forEach(file => { const filePath = path.join(dir, file); const stat = fs.statSync(filePath); if (stat.isDirectory()) { routes = routes.concat(getRoutes(filePath, path.join(baseRoute, file))); } else if (file !== '_app.js' && file !== '_document.js' && file !== '_error.js') { const route = path.join(baseRoute, file.replace(/\.(js|jsx|ts|tsx)$/, '')).replace(/\/index$/, '') || '/'; routes.push(route); } }); return routes; }; const pagesDir = path.join(__dirname, 'pages'); const appDir = path.join(__dirname, 'app'); const routes = getRoutes(pagesDir).concat(getRoutes(appDir)); console.log('Routes:'); routes.forEach(route => console.log(route));"
